other_tests.findings: Mild restrictive pattern: forced expiratory volume in 1 second of 1.63 (54%), forced vital capacity of 1.85 (44%), total lung capacity of 3.08 (56%), expiratory reserve volume of 0.42 (46%), and functional residual capacity of 1.37 (47%).
Large eventration of the whole left hemidiaphragm invading about 2 thirds of the pleural cavity; central part of the phrenic dome reduced to a thin transparent film.
Negative findings, no central or peripheral nervous lesions accounting for phrenic nerve palsy.
Complete healing of the pulmonary lesion.
